description: This scholarship was established in 2007 by Dr. Tess Remy-Schumacher and David Morris in honor of their parents Drs. Susanne and Horst Remy, and Mr. and Mrs. Marjorie and David Morris, Sr. for outstanding students enrolling in applied cello or applied strings, and orchestra. Eligibility Incoming Freshman and Transfer Students are eligible to apply. Student pursuing a degree in Music with preference given to a student studying strings. Preference given to a student who has been verified through FAFSA as a "Former Ward of the Court". Preference given to previous recipients. Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
